p: The monthly HFRS cases recorded in the study area from 2000 to 2017 were collected from the City Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). The National Infectious Disease Reporting system reported all HFRS cases to the City CDC, which verified all the HFRS cases that were first diagnosed in hospitals or clinics. The cityâ€™s population data from 2000 to 2017 were determined based on information from the City Bureau of Statistics. Environmental factors for the city during the study periods, including monthly average temperature, average air pressure, average sunshine, average wind speed, monthly precipitation, and average moisture, were collected from the City Meteorological Bureau. Over the course of the 18-year study period, 794 cases were registered in the study area.
